main.bio: Learning how to speak JavaScript & React at the moment. Really into Front-end as it soothes my OCD senses and need for having things perfectly aligned while also addressing my need to be challenged and find the best possible solution. I'm also a photographer & filmmaker. Visual Storytelling is my craft.
main.contactmessage: That´s ok, you can email me, i am pretty confident that one, but mostly my daugther, will find the time to read it and reply.

testimonials.text: That Carlos Teixeira is a brilliant developer, despite he´s just starting ! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. In your position i would hire this guy, he may be fresh out of bootcamp and have zero experience on this field but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time, he is committed, respectful, hard worker , and has a excelent teamspirit.
